kannada_original: ಯಾರು ಇತ್ತರೊ ನಗುತ, ಅವರೆ ವಂದ್ಯರು ಜಗದಿ;
english_transliteration: Yāru ittaro naguta, avare vandhyaru jagadi;
english_translation: Those who gave smilingly, they are respectable in the world;
Those who possessed yet did not give, they are the ones who wept (or are despised).

kannada_original: ಬಡ ದೇಹ ಏನೇನ ಸಾಧಿಸಿತೊ ಈ ಜಗದಿ!
english_transliteration: Baḍa dēha ēnēna sādhisi-to ī jagadi!
english_translation: What all did the poor body achieve in this world!
You learn from Gandhi – Muddu Rama.
